command.about.description.en: Multi purpose eRepublik discord bot by $[1]

bot.prompt.confirm.en: Are you sure you want to $[1]

command.config.locale_changed.en: Default language for guild $[1] set to **english**

command.config.prefix_changed.en: Command prefix for guild $[1] set to $[2]

command.blacklist.user_not_banned.en: User $[1] is not in the blacklist

command.market.description.en: Shows 5 best offers for a product

command.register.description.en: Attach an eRepublik account to your discord for additional features
command.register.description.lv: Pievieno savu eRepublik kontu, lai saņemtu papildus iespējas

command.register.usage_note.en: Citizen ID is the number at the end of your profile URL
command.register.usage_note.lv: Citizen ID ir ciparu kombinācija tava profila linka beigās

command.register.user_not_found.en: Citizen with ID $[1] was not found

command.register.verified.en: Your ownership of citizen $[1] has been verified!
command.register.verified.lv: Tu tiki veiksmīgi verificēts kā profila $[1] īpašnieks!

command.register.verified1.en: You can now remove the verification code from your profile page
command.register.verified1.lv: Verifikācijas kods tavā profila lapā vairs nav vajadzīgs

command.register.add_code.en: To verify your ownership of $[1], please add $[2] to your eRepublik account's __About me__ section and then run this command again
command.register.add_code.lv: Lai verificētu tevi kā konta $[1] īpašnieku, lūdzu pievieno $[2] sava eRepublik profila __About me__ sadaļā un ieraksti šo komandu vēlreiz

command.register.already_verified.en: You have already successfully claimed this account
command.register.already_verified.lv: Tu jau esi verificēts kā šī konta īpašnieks

command.register.already_claimed.en: Citizen with the ID $[1] is already claimed by $[2] Would you like to reclaim this account
command.register.already_claimed.lv: Konts ar ID $[1] jau pieder $[2] Vai Tu vēlies piesavināt šo kontu

command.stats.description.en: Shows basic profile information about a player
command.stats.description.lv: Parāda pamata informāciju par kādu spēlētāju

command.stats.invalid.en: Please enter a valid username/user id or register (via !register yourID) to look up your own stats
command.stats.invalid.lv: Lūdzu ievadi pareizi lietotājvārdu/id vai reģistrējies (izmantojot komandu !register tavsID), lai redzētu savus status
